MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL60 and LL77 postcode area of Llangefni and Gaerwen, affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  Midday. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.18PM on 9th November 2020
